snooker.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a game played especially in Britain on a special table covered in green cloth, in which two people use long sticks to hit coloured balls into holes at the sides and corners of the table
snooker.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: They meet up every Friday to play snooker.
snooker.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to make it impossible for someone to do what they want to do
snooker.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: If the council refuses our planning application, weâ€™re snookered.
